title: How to Make Old-Fashioned Evergreen Wreaths
description: Learn how to make an old-fashioned evergreen wreath and decorations like the pioneers, using items already growing on your homestead and land or in your home. How to repurpose and reuse them for your homemade holiday decor.
content:encoded: Learn how to make an old-fashioned evergreen wreath and decorations like the pioneers, using items already growing on your homestead and land or in your home. How to repurpose and reuse them for your homemade holiday decor.
itunes:subtitle: Use Items on Your Land to Decorate
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
itunes:author: Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader
itunes:summary: Learn how to make an old-fashioned evergreen wreath and decorations like the pioneers, using items already growing on your homestead and land or in your home. How to repurpose and reuse them for your homemade holiday decor.
